org.transitime.core.travelTimes

Class TravelTimesProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.core.travelTimes.TravelTimesProcessor

  • public class TravelTimesProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes arrival/departure times plus the matches (where vehicle is matched to a route between stops) that are read from db and processes the data into average travel and dwell times and stores the data into maps. The travel times can then be written to the database.

    The data is processed on a per tripId basis. With GTFS trips are unique across service IDs and days of the week so this is adequate. But at some point really might want to divide up the data by day of the week in order to get greater accuracy (assuming that buses might consistently travel differently on Monday compared to Friday even though they have the same service ID.

    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

      • createTravelTimesFromMaps

        public TravelTimeInfoMap createTravelTimesFromMaps(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Trip> tripMap)
        Takes the data from the stopTimesMap and travelTimesMap and creates corresponding travel times. Puts those travel times into the TravelTimeInfoMap that is returned.
        Parameters:
        tripMap - contains all the trips that are configured and that need travel times for.
        Returns:
        TravelTimeInfoMap The generated travel times
